summary: A lot of people live in an abandoned house; after many years of quiet living, the owner of the house wants them out. They try whatever they can to avoid being evicted, without success. But ... See full summary »
cast: Fausto Cabrera|Frank Ramírez|Delfina Guido|Vicky Hernández|Humberto Dorado|Gustavo Angarita|Antonio Aparicio|Eduardo Arias|Jaime Azcárate|Salvatore Basile|Rosa Virginia Bonilla|Jairo Camargo|Ivan Castano|Mauricio Castano|Sain Castro|Luis Chiape|Ulises Colmenares|Yesid Ferrara|Armando Floyd|Marcela Gallego|Yolanda García|José Garzón|Clemencia Gregory|Edilberto Gómez|Jorge Herrera|Alejandro Junca|Florina Lemaitre|Angelo Javier Lozano|Ernesto Malbran|Víctor Mallarino|Larry Guillermo Mejía|Luis Fernando Montoya|Luis Fernando Munera|Rodrigo Obregón|Alberto Palacio|Edgardo Román|Alberto Sánchez Figueroa|Rafael Uribe|Miguel Ignacio Vanegas|Carlos Vives|Diego Vélez|Jorge Zuluaga
title: La estrategia del caracol
